 I definitely don't like the idea of deciding a debate based on a poll. It takes it from a skill contest and makes it a popularity contest, IMO. I've judged debates in which I disagreed with the winner's position, but thought he won the debate none-the-less. I'm not so sure that would be the norm, however.
